item.title: Rodolfo Novak Coldcard Mk3 (2019-09-14)
item.description: Name: Rodolfo Novak Topic: Coldcard Mk3 - Security in Depth Location: Baltic Honeybadger 2019 Date: September 14th 2019 Audio: https://youtu.be/2IpZWSWUIVE?t=23739 Intro My name is Rodolfo, I have been around Bitcoin for a little while. We make hardware. Today I wanted to get a little bit into how do you make a hardware wallet secure in a little bit more layman’s terms. Go through the process of getting that done. What were the options When I closed my last company and decided to find a place to store my coins I couldn’t really find a wallet that satisfied two things that I needed.
